dialog.text: Morning %you.first_name%.  Finally caught up with Tanya.  We were on a Slack call and I told her how I thought she had been mean to me over the last 8 weeks.  Do you want to know what she said?

joins.text: Good, cause I was going to tell you anyway 😃

dialog.text: She claimed that she saw I was struggling and thought she was being helpful.  Well I said that's now how she came across - although not in those words :wink:  I then made some excuse and got off the call.  How's your team doing?

joins.text: You have been so lucky with your team mates.

dialog.text: I know you've had some problems, but at least the ones that have are nice.  I just don't seem to connect to anyone except for you and Jeff.  Anyway, got to go get something to eat.
